abstract: The order raised concerns that the online video viewing habits of tens of millions of people could be exposed.
snippet: The order raised concerns that the online video viewing habits of tens of millions of people could be exposed.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO  A federal judge has ordered Google to turn over to Viacom its records of which users watched which videos on YouTube, the Web’s largest video site by far.

headline.main: Google Told to Turn Over User Data of YouTube
headline.print_headline: Google Told To Turn Over User Data Of YouTube

abstract: Google has added the word “privacy” to its home page, bringing it into clear compliance with a California law that requires many Internet sites to have a link to their privacy policy on their home page.
snippet: Google has added the word “privacy” to its home page, bringing it into clear compliance with a California law that requires many Internet sites to have a link to their privacy policy on their home page.

headline.main: Google Changes Home Page, Adding Link to Privacy Policy
